name: pliability Run to Hawaii Challenge
description: Complete 80K in June to earn free pliability—and a shot at racing in Hawaii!
reward: Complete 80K in June to earn a free month of pliability, plus a chance to win a trip to race in Hawaii!

reward: Earn your exclusive HOKA Together We Fly Higher digital badge and the chance to win a pair of Rocket X 3. See T\u0026Cs for more details.

name: CamelBak Podium Challenge
description: It's summer! Ride your bike for 200 min to unlock your personal 20% discount code and win 1 of 3 Podium bottle packages!
reward: Ride for 200 mins to earn a 20% discount code and enter for a chance to win 1 of 3 CamelBak Podium bottle packages

name: Get Sponsored By The Feed
description: Stay active for 21 days—one for every stage of the Tour de France
reward: Complete the challenge and earn $60 Feed Cash to fuel your training.

name: Sky Sports 215 Minutes Challenge
description: Complete 215 mins of activity for your chance to win Sky Sports for a year
task: Complete 215 mins of activity in total
reward: Log 215 minutes for the chance to win Sky Glass with Sky Sports free for a year and 1 of 100 NOW Sports Memberships

name: Lone River's Variety Pack Challenge
description: Adventure comes in all forms. Eight days of movement unlocks bold rewards.
reward: Complete the challenge for a chance to win some seriously sweet rewards - like luxury glamping at Runningman 2025.

name: Alpro Follow the Leaf Challenge: Run in Nature
description: Log 90 minutes of running for a chance to win a Polar watch
task: Log 90 mins running activity over 10 days
reward: Complete the challenge for the chance to win a Polar Vantage M3 Watch

name: Suunto Run 5k Challenge
description: Complete a 5km run for the chance to win the new Suunto Run GPS watch.
reward: Complete the challenge for the chance to win 1 of 5 new Suunto Run GPS watches.

name: Gobik Challenge: I spy
description: Gobik Challenge: I Spy – Ride 150 km in 2 weeks. Win a Gobik Bundle!
task: Complete 150 Km riding in two weeks
reward: Complete the Challenge for a chance to win Gobik’s exclusive bundle and stay geared up for a year of rides!

name: Michelob ULTRA Zero Excuses Challenge
description: Log 29 miles, then enter for a chance to win a bib to the NYC Marathon.
task: Log 29 miles of activity by August 3
reward: Ready to make moves? Complete the challenge for your chance to win a bib to the NYC Marathon and more!​

name: Experience A New High: Altra x REI Bridge
description: Run from Mile High to REI and earn an exclusive Altra badge.
reward: Crush this segment (or all 5) and earn an Altra badge for your Trophy Case.
